newsitem.title: USA: Miami finance director Surana resigns.
newsitem.headline: Miami finance director Surana resigns.

text.p: Miami deputy finance director Dipak Parekh was appointed acting director on Tuesday following the resignation of finance director Manohar Surana, city officials said.

Surana, who was also assistant city manager, announced his resignation on Friday in a memo to City Manager Cesar Odio. Surana, 52, was unavailable for comment on Tuesday, but said in the memo he was retiring.
